item.title: Auto-teleporter
item.dc:creator: @lilshu lilshu
item.description:
@lilshu wrote:

Thanks for all the feedback, I will get working on the stuff (making more human like mouse movements, maybe a certer antirandom)

{                    lilshu's tele auto
                        version 1
instructions:
       1) set your screen resolution to 1024x768
       2) drag the crosshairs over your RuneScape client window
       3) Start the script, and watch the magic
note: there are no anti-randoms in this script, so keep an eye out
humanspeak (C)2004 Alex aka PPLSUQBAWLZ
 }
program AutoTele;

Procedure TypeSend(text:string);
var  LoadNumber:Integer;
begin
     LoadNumber:=1;
     repeat
           SendKeysSilent(StrGet(Text, loadnumber));
           LoadNumber:=LoadNumber+1;
           Wait(TypeSendTime+random(TypeSendRan));
     until(LoadNumber>Length(text));
end;


var spell, x, y, xx, yy, amt, count, i, a: integer;
var
   Font, FontWidth, Font2, FontWidth2, Font3, FontWidth3: array[1..82] of integer;
   FontChar: array[1..82] of string;
   fx,fy,tempimg,tempwidth,tempheight:integer;
const
     smooth=true;
     movespeed=30; // 1 - 30 : slow - fast
     movewait=50;
     movewaitran=50;
     clicktiming=250;
     clicktimingran=250;
     TypeSendTime=100;
     TypeSendRan=100;
     DisplayDebug=false;
     FontPath='.\CharsChat\';
     // VERSION..
     LibVersion='1.0';
var message1,message2,message3,message4,message5,message6,message7,message8,message9: string;
begin
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
{userset variables, enter them in here}
spell:=5;  //This sets the spell type
           //1=varrock
           //2=lumbridge
           //3=falador
           //4=house
           //5=camelot
           //6=ardougne
           //7=whatchtower
           //8=trollheim
amt:=15;    //how many teleports you want to do
message1:='Just teleying, lalala, teleying'+Chr(13);
message2:='So......bored.............'+Chr(13);
message3:='Magic levels?'+Chr(13);
message4:='Dance party baby!!!'+Chr(13);
message5:='laws so many laws'+Chr(13);
message6:='Why am I so bored....hmmmmm'+Chr(13);
message7:='I should be mining now'+Chr(13);
message8:='My name isn''bobo!!!!!'+Chr(13);
message9:='Time for me to be quiet'+Chr(13);
{end userset variables}
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
ClearDebug;
ClearReport;
xx:=740;
yy:=192;
clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
  if( spell = 1)then
  begin
  ActivateClient;
   Writeln('teleport style: varrock');
   x:=710;
   y:=250;
         i:= 0;
         count:=0;
         while(i < amt) do
         begin
         i:= i + 1;
         count:=count+1;
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         clickmouse(x,y,true);
         wait(3000+random(500));
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         wait(100+random(10));
         status('teleporting to Varrock');
         ClearDebug;
         ClearReport;
         writeln(IntToStr(count));
         if(i=7)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message1);
             end;
         if(i=12)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message2);
             end;
         if(i=24)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message3);
             end;
         if(i=30)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message4);
             end;
         if(i=32)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message5);
             end;
         if(i=47)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message6);
             end;
         if(i=50)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message7);
             end;
         if(i=60)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message8);
             end;
         if(i=100)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message9);
             end;
         end;
  end;
  
  if( spell = 2)then
  begin
  ActivateClient;
    a:= 0;
    Writeln('teleport style: lumbridge');
    x:=607;
    y:=276;
         i:= 0;
         count:=0;
         while(i < amt) do
         begin
         i:= i + 1;
         count:=count+1;
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         clickmouse(x,y,true);
         wait(3000+random(500));
         status('teleporting to Lumbridge');
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         wait(100+random(10));
         ClearDebug;
         ClearReport;
         writeln(IntToStr(count));
         if(i=7)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message1);
             end;
         if(i=12)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message2);
             end;
         if(i=24)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message3);
             end;
         if(i=30)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message4);
             end;
         if(i=32)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message5);
             end;
         if(i=47)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message6);
             end;
         if(i=50)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message7);
             end;
         if(i=60)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message8);
             end;
         if(i=100)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message9);
             end;
         end;
  end;
  
  if( spell = 3)then
  begin
  ActivateClient;
    a:= 0;
    Writeln('teleport style: falador');
    x:=686;
   y:=277;
         i:= 0;
         count:=0;
         while(i < amt) do
         begin
         i:= i + 1;
         count:=count+1;
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         clickmouse(x,y,true);
         wait(3000+random(500));
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         status('teleporting to Falador');
         wait(100+random(10));
         ClearDebug;
         ClearReport;
         writeln(IntToStr(count));
         if(i=7)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message1);
             end;
         if(i=12)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message2);
             end;
         if(i=24)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message3);
             end;
         if(i=30)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message4);
             end;
         if(i=32)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message5);
             end;
         if(i=47)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message6);
             end;
         if(i=50)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message7);
             end;
         if(i=60)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message8);
             end;
         if(i=100)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message9);
             end;
         end;
  end;

  if( spell = 4)then
  begin
  ActivateClient;
    a:= 0;
    Writeln('teleport style: house');
    x:=565;
   y:=302;
         i:= 0;
         count:=0;
         while(i < amt) do
         begin
         i:= i + 1;
         count:=count+1;
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         clickmouse(x,y,true);
         wait(3000+random(500));
         status('teleporting to your hizzouse');
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         wait(100+random(10));
         ClearDebug;
         ClearReport;
         writeln(IntToStr(count));
         if(i=7)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message1);
             end;
         if(i=12)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message2);
             end;
         if(i=24)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message3);
             end;
         if(i=30)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message4);
             end;
         if(i=32)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message5);
             end;
         if(i=47)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message6);
             end;
         if(i=50)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message7);
             end;
         if(i=60)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message8);
             end;
         if(i=100)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message9);
             end;
         end;
  end;
  
  if( spell = 5)then
  begin
  ActivateClient;
    a:= 0;
    Writeln('teleport style: camelot');
    x:=635;
   y:=298;

         i:= 0;
         count:=0;
         while(i < amt) do
         begin
         i:= i + 1;
         count:=count+1;
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         clickmouse(x,y,true);
         wait(3000+random(500));
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         status('teleporting to Camelot');
         wait(100+random(10));
         ClearDebug;
         ClearReport;
         writeln(IntToStr(count));
         if(i=7)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message1);
             end;
         if(i=12)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message2);
             end;
         if(i=24)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message3);
             end;
         if(i=30)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message4);
             end;
         if(i=32)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message5);
             end;
         if(i=47)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message6);
             end;
         if(i=50)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message7);
             end;
         if(i=60)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message8);
             end;
         if(i=100)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message9);
             end;
         end;
  end;
  
  if( spell = 6)then
  begin
  ActivateClient;
    a:= 0;
    Writeln('teleport style: ardougne');
    x:=614;
   y:=321;
         i:= 0;
         count:=0;
         while(i < amt) do
         begin
         i:= i + 1;
         count:=count+1;
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         clickmouse(x,y,true);
         wait(3000+random(500));
         status('teleporting to Ardougne');
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         wait(100+random(10));
         ClearDebug;
         ClearReport;
         writeln(IntToStr(count));
         if(i=7)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message1);
             end;
         if(i=12)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message2);
             end;
         if(i=24)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message3);
             end;
         if(i=30)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message4);
             end;
         if(i=32)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message5);
             end;
         if(i=47)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message6);
             end;
         if(i=50)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message7);
             end;
         if(i=60)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message8);
             end;
         if(i=100)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message9);
             end;
         end;
  end;
  
  if( spell = 7)then
  begin
  ActivateClient;
    a:= 0;
    Writeln('teleport style: watchtower');
    x:=564;
   y:=349;
         i:= 0;
         count:=0;
         while(i < amt) do
         begin
         i:= i + 1;
         count:=count+1;
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         clickmouse(x,y,true);
         wait(3000+random(500));
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         wait(100+random(10));
         status('teleporting to WatchTower');
         ClearDebug;
         ClearReport;
         writeln(IntToStr(count));
         if(i=7)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message1);
             end;
         if(i=12)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message2);
             end;
         if(i=24)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message3);
             end;
         if(i=30)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message4);
             end;
         if(i=32)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message5);
             end;
         if(i=47)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message6);
             end;
         if(i=50)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message7);
             end;
         if(i=60)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message8);
             end;
         if(i=100)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message9);
             end;
         end;
  end;
  
  if( spell = 8)then
  begin
  ActivateClient;
    a:= 0;
    Writeln('teleport style: trollheim');
    x:=567;
   y:=375;
         i:= 0;
         count:=0;
         while(i < amt) do
         begin
         i:= i + 1;
         count:=count+1;
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         status('teleporting to Trollheim');
         clickmouse(x,y,true);
         wait(3000+random(500));
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         wait(100+random(10));
         ClearDebug;
         ClearReport;
         writeln(IntToStr(count));
         if(i=7)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message1);
             end;
         if(i=12)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message2);
             end;
         if(i=24)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message3);
             end;
         if(i=30)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message4);
             end;
         if(i=32)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message5);
             end;
         if(i=47)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message6);
             end;
         if(i=50)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message7);
             end;
         if(i=60)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message8);
             end;
         if(i=100)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message9);
             end;
         end;
  end;
end.

So would that be how to put the procedure in correctly?

Read full topic

item.title: Auto-teleporter
item.dc:creator: @Spky Spky
item.description:
@Spky wrote:

Nice first script:).

Why do you have the TypeSend procedure as an include?
All you need to do to include it is paste it somewhere above the main loop.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto-teleporter
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Nice script!

It looks great, except I suggest using a more human mouse procedure, but other than that, one of the best first scripts I have seen in a while. Keep it up! You have potential.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto-teleporter
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Wow cool script and you used nice standards! Good job.

I haven’t tested the script, but I have looked it over. I neevr test rs scripts for fear of ban. :rolleyes: lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto-teleporter
item.dc:creator: @lilshu lilshu
item.description:
@lilshu wrote:

My first useful script, what it does is autocast a teleport spell of your choice. no random even protection or anything like that. But I guess I can do that later. My brother tested it out for 200 camelot tele’s and said it was good, but annoying having to pause it for a telematrix. Tell me what ya think!

Main File:

{                    lilshu's tele auto
                        version 1
instructions:
       1) set your screen resolution to 1024x768
       2) drag the crosshairs over your RuneScape client window
       3) Start the script, and watch the magic
note: there are no anti-randoms in this script, so keep an eye out
humanspeak (C)2004 Alex aka PPLSUQBAWLZ
 }
program AutoTele;
var spell, x, y, xx, yy, amt, count, i, a: integer;
var
   Font, FontWidth, Font2, FontWidth2, Font3, FontWidth3: array[1..82] of integer;
   FontChar: array[1..82] of string;
   fx,fy,tempimg,tempwidth,tempheight:integer;
const
     smooth=true;
     movespeed=30; // 1 - 30 : slow - fast
     movewait=50;
     movewaitran=50;
     clicktiming=250;
     clicktimingran=250;
     TypeSendTime=100;
     TypeSendRan=100;
     DisplayDebug=false;
     FontPath='.\CharsChat\';
     // VERSION..
     LibVersion='1.0';
var message1,message2,message3,message4,message5,message6,message7,message8,message9: string;
{.include typesend.txt}
begin
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
{userset variables, enter them in here}
spell:=5;  //This sets the spell type
           //1=varrock
           //2=lumbridge
           //3=falador
           //4=house
           //5=camelot
           //6=ardougne
           //7=whatchtower
           //8=trollheim
amt:=15;    //how many teleports you want to do
message1:='Just teleying, lalala, teleying'+Chr(13);
message2:='So......bored.............'+Chr(13);
message3:='Magic levels?'+Chr(13);
message4:='Dance party baby!!!'+Chr(13);
message5:='laws so many laws'+Chr(13);
message6:='Why am I so bored....hmmmmm'+Chr(13);
message7:='I should be mining now'+Chr(13);
message8:='My name isn''bobo!!!!!'+Chr(13);
message9:='Time for me to be quiet'+Chr(13);
{end userset variables}
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
ClearDebug;
ClearReport;
xx:=740;
yy:=192;
clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
  if( spell = 1)then
  begin
  ActivateClient;
   Writeln('teleport style: varrock');
   x:=710;
   y:=250;
         i:= 0;
         count:=0;
         while(i < amt) do
         begin
         i:= i + 1;
         count:=count+1;
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         clickmouse(x,y,true);
         wait(3000+random(500));
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         wait(100+random(10));
         status('teleporting to Varrock');
         ClearDebug;
         ClearReport;
         writeln(IntToStr(count));
         if(i=7)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message1);
             end;
         if(i=12)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message2);
             end;
         if(i=24)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message3);
             end;
         if(i=30)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message4);
             end;
         if(i=32)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message5);
             end;
         if(i=47)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message6);
             end;
         if(i=50)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message7);
             end;
         if(i=60)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message8);
             end;
         if(i=100)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message9);
             end;
         end;
  end;
  
  if( spell = 2)then
  begin
  ActivateClient;
    a:= 0;
    Writeln('teleport style: lumbridge');
    x:=607;
    y:=276;
         i:= 0;
         count:=0;
         while(i < amt) do
         begin
         i:= i + 1;
         count:=count+1;
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         clickmouse(x,y,true);
         wait(3000+random(500));
         status('teleporting to Lumbridge');
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         wait(100+random(10));
         ClearDebug;
         ClearReport;
         writeln(IntToStr(count));
         if(i=7)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message1);
             end;
         if(i=12)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message2);
             end;
         if(i=24)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message3);
             end;
         if(i=30)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message4);
             end;
         if(i=32)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message5);
             end;
         if(i=47)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message6);
             end;
         if(i=50)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message7);
             end;
         if(i=60)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message8);
             end;
         if(i=100)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message9);
             end;
         end;
  end;
  
  if( spell = 3)then
  begin
  ActivateClient;
    a:= 0;
    Writeln('teleport style: falador');
    x:=686;
   y:=277;
         i:= 0;
         count:=0;
         while(i < amt) do
         begin
         i:= i + 1;
         count:=count+1;
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         clickmouse(x,y,true);
         wait(3000+random(500));
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         status('teleporting to Falador');
         wait(100+random(10));
         ClearDebug;
         ClearReport;
         writeln(IntToStr(count));
         if(i=7)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message1);
             end;
         if(i=12)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message2);
             end;
         if(i=24)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message3);
             end;
         if(i=30)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message4);
             end;
         if(i=32)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message5);
             end;
         if(i=47)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message6);
             end;
         if(i=50)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message7);
             end;
         if(i=60)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message8);
             end;
         if(i=100)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message9);
             end;
         end;
  end;

  if( spell = 4)then
  begin
  ActivateClient;
    a:= 0;
    Writeln('teleport style: house');
    x:=565;
   y:=302;
         i:= 0;
         count:=0;
         while(i < amt) do
         begin
         i:= i + 1;
         count:=count+1;
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         clickmouse(x,y,true);
         wait(3000+random(500));
         status('teleporting to your hizzouse');
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         wait(100+random(10));
         ClearDebug;
         ClearReport;
         writeln(IntToStr(count));
         if(i=7)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message1);
             end;
         if(i=12)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message2);
             end;
         if(i=24)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message3);
             end;
         if(i=30)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message4);
             end;
         if(i=32)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message5);
             end;
         if(i=47)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message6);
             end;
         if(i=50)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message7);
             end;
         if(i=60)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message8);
             end;
         if(i=100)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message9);
             end;
         end;
  end;
  
  if( spell = 5)then
  begin
  ActivateClient;
    a:= 0;
    Writeln('teleport style: camelot');
    x:=635;
   y:=298;

         i:= 0;
         count:=0;
         while(i < amt) do
         begin
         i:= i + 1;
         count:=count+1;
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         clickmouse(x,y,true);
         wait(3000+random(500));
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         status('teleporting to Camelot');
         wait(100+random(10));
         ClearDebug;
         ClearReport;
         writeln(IntToStr(count));
         if(i=7)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message1);
             end;
         if(i=12)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message2);
             end;
         if(i=24)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message3);
             end;
         if(i=30)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message4);
             end;
         if(i=32)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message5);
             end;
         if(i=47)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message6);
             end;
         if(i=50)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message7);
             end;
         if(i=60)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message8);
             end;
         if(i=100)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message9);
             end;
         end;
  end;
  
  if( spell = 6)then
  begin
  ActivateClient;
    a:= 0;
    Writeln('teleport style: ardougne');
    x:=614;
   y:=321;
         i:= 0;
         count:=0;
         while(i < amt) do
         begin
         i:= i + 1;
         count:=count+1;
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         clickmouse(x,y,true);
         wait(3000+random(500));
         status('teleporting to Ardougne');
         clickmouse(xx,yy,true);
         wait(100+random(10));
         ClearDebug;
         ClearReport;
         writeln(IntToStr(count));
         if(i=7)then
             begin
             TypeSend(Message1);

         if(i=60)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message8);
             end;
         if(i=100)then
             begin
             TypeSend(message9);
             end;
         end;
  end;

And the typesend include:

Procedure TypeSend(text:string); var LoadNumber:Integer; begin LoadNumber:=1; repeat SendKeysSilent(StrGet(Text, loadnumber)); LoadNumber:=LoadNumber+1; Wait(TypeSendTime+random(TypeSendRan)); until(LoadNumber>Length(text)); end;
